title: I can help too
brief_description: Six-year-old Sonya shows young viewers how they can make a difference to the family’s workload by helping with simple tasks around the house. With assistance and direction from a formidable aunt, Sonya identifies jobs that she is able to accomplish and earns her place as a valued and needed member of the family team. The message is that everyone benefits when everyone, even the youngest member of the family, helps. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students. Teacher’s guide included.
